attributes.action: stop acting like the prat he is and to acknowledge that there are well educated, intelligent people in this country who are far more qualified than any failed scottish constituency MP, like him, to comment on the whether or not immigration is of benefit to this country or not.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Gordon Brown has only one interest and aim in life and that is himself and his own self-enrichment.  He might as well rename himself Robert Mugabe if he is not prepared to acknowledge the wisdom and intelligence of non-party political intellectuals who say that Nu-Labour is getting it VERY wrong.  He should resign as an out and out failure and beg the next prime minister, whoever that might be, to allow him to skulk back to his constituency in Scotland, instead of being put on trial in 
England for treason, theft and betrayal.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
